root.name: The Tick
root.description: GameplayThe Tick plays like a typical beat-em-up style game. The player has a punch and kick button that can be used to defeat enemies. In addition, the player can collect a power-up where a partner will come to offer aid by covering The Tick's back. The player can also use a special move where The Tick calls for assistance from his flying friend Arthur, and Arthur will come sweeping down clearing the screen of enemies.

similar_games.game: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game
